name: GB To Powerlink
author: gilwebdeveloper

sections.description:
GB To Powerlink integrates contact information sent via Contact Form 7, with the user’s Power Link account.
Users must have an active Fireberry account in order to use GB to powerlink, and data used in this plugin is dent to the Fireberry system.

The free version of this plugin uses onley 3 fields from the Contact Form 7 form.
These are the onley fields you can use with this free version of the plugin: “your-name”, “your-email”, “your-tel”.
These fields are automatically integrated with 3 default fields from the “Customers” table in Fireberry.
These are the onley fireberry fields you can use with this free version of the plugin: “accountname”, “emailaddress1”, “telephone1”.
The onley setting you need to input is the token ID. All other settings will be made autommaticley.
Once an end-user sends a message on your site’s CF7 form, his contact details are automatically entered in your “Customers” table.

The plugin’s premium version, GB To Fireberry Pro, allows the admin to customize and add unlimited number of forms, fields and connections, using an easy and convenient interface.

Docs and support

gb-plugins.com
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/powerlink directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the GBWeb PowerLink Lite screen to configure the plugin
  4. Enter your Fireberry TokenID into the TokenID field and save.
  5. Once you enter and save a valid TokenID, the field will turn green and a success message will appear.
  6. Use the default CF7 field names in your contact form ([your-name], [your-email]).
  7. To add a phone number field use the field-name: [your-tel].
sections.faq:
Where can I find my Fireberry TokenID?

Watch video in your panel after installation.

Where will the contact information appear on Power Link CRM?

The integrated data will be added to the \’Customers\’ table on your Fireberry CRM.

Can I customize the form and table\’s fields?

Fields customization is offered with the plugin\’s pro version.

Where can I purchase the plugin\’s pro version?

To purchase GBWeb Fireberry Pro, contact GBWEB via https://gb-powerlink.gb-plugins.com.
sections.changelog:
2.1

  • Fix bug issues

2.0

  • Send post data replace by send API

1.1

  • Your-name related field changed from ‘accountname’ to ‘firstname’.

1.0.1

  • Fireberry API URL Changed.
  • Cosmetic change to readme.txt file.

1.0

  • First stable version.
  • Active and proven version.

short_description: GB To Powerlink allows Fireberry CRM (formerly known as PowerLink) users to easily integrate Contact Form 7 with their Fireberry CRM.
